author: wouf
body:
#### PR description: 
This is IB crash fix (see [this](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47838#issuecomment-2829629845) comment from #47838 ) for workflows 574-577. The genfragments were replaced with proper ones (which already use the ExternalGeneratorFilter):
574.0  Hydjet:
Hydjet_Quenched_B12_5020GeV_ExtGen_cfi -> Hydjet_Quenched_B12_5020GeV_cfi 
575.0 - AMPT: 
AMPT_Ppb_5020GeV_MinimumBias_ExtGen_cfi -> AMPT_PPb_5020GeV_MinimumBias_cfi
576.0 - EPOS: 
ReggeGribovPartonMC_..._pPb_ExtGen_cfi -> ReggeGribovPartonMC_..._pPb_cfi          
577.0 - PYQUEN: 
Pyquen_ZeemumuJets_pt10_2760GeV_ExtGen_cfi -> Pyquen_ZeemumuJets_pt10_2760GeV_cfi
 
#### Backport is needed to 
14_1_X
14_2_X
15_0_X
title: IB crash fix for workflows 574.0 - 577.0
